name: Rovastar & Zylot - Reactor Mirage
milkdrop_raw:
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000
fGammaAdj=2.050000
fDecay=1.000000
fVideoEchoZoom=1.999595
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.500000
nVideoEchoOrientation=0
nWaveMode=0
bAdditiveWaves=0
bWaveDots=0
bWaveThick=1
bModWaveAlphaByVolume=0
bMaximizeWaveColor=1
bTexWrap=1
bDarkenCenter=0
bRedBlueStereo=0
bBrighten=1
bDarken=0
bSolarize=0
bInvert=0
fWaveAlpha=1.532000
fWaveScale=0.000000
fWaveSmoothing=0.000000
fWaveParam=-0.319900
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.750000
fModWaveAlphaEnd=0.950000
fWarpAnimSpeed=1.000000
fWarpScale=1.000000
fZoomExponent=1.000000
fShader=0.000000
zoom=1.000000
rot=0.000000
cx=0.500000
cy=0.500000
dx=0.000000
dy=0.000000
warp=1.000000
sx=1.000000
sy=1.000000
wave_r=0.500000
wave_g=0.500000
wave_b=0.500000
wave_x=0.500000
wave_y=0.500000
ob_size=0.005000
ob_r=0.000000
ob_g=0.000000
ob_b=0.000000
ob_a=1.000000
ib_size=0.010000
ib_r=0.250000
ib_g=0.250000
ib_b=0.250000
ib_a=0.000000
nMotionVectorsX=64.000000
nMotionVectorsY=48.000000
mv_dx=0.000000
mv_dy=0.000000
mv_l=0.005000
mv_r=1.000000
mv_g=0.000000
mv_b=0.000000
mv_a=1.000000
per_frame_1=warp = 0;
per_frame_2=wave_r = .5 + (wave_color1*sin(time*.555));
per_frame_3=wave_g = .5 + (wave_color2*sin(time*.444));
per_frame_4=wave_b = .5 + (wave_color3*sin(time*.666));
per_frame_5=wave_mystery = wave_mystery +0.01*(frame%20)+ bass*.01;
per_frame_6=bass_test = above(bass+bass_att,2.2);
per_frame_7=wave_mystery = if(bass_test,if(frame%2,0,1),wave_mystery);
per_frame_8=wave_mode = if(bass_test,7,wave_mode);
per_frame_9=wave_y = if(bass_test,0.25,wave_y);
per_frame_10=decay = if(above((frame)%2,0),decay,.71);
per_frame_11=wave_r = if(bass_test,1,0);
per_frame_12=dx = .5;
per_frame_13=dy = .5;
per_frame_14=zoom = 0.58+0.058*(bass+bass_att);
per_frame_15=ob_r = if(above(treb,1.2),treb*.1,0);
per_frame_16=mv_r = if(above(bass_att,1.2),bass*.1,0);
per_frame_17=ib_a = if(above(bass,2),1,0);
per_frame_18=echo_zoom =0.9+0.5*(2*bass+bass_att);
per_frame_init_1=wave_color1 = (int(rand(50))*.01);
per_frame_init_2=wave_color2 = (int(rand(50))*.01);
per_frame_init_3=wave_color3 = (int(rand(50))*.01);
